name: TiktaalikDreamings Realistic Weapon Pack
description:
Intended to add some vaguely more realistic weapons from history instead of the very fantasy cliche things in the game.  

A list of Items is here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cTkd5ywF-1B9_VwyOHvri-QBNvMNvPp4/view?usp=sharing

Mod discord here https://discord.gg/XEUZxZRVF9
changeNote: Complete revision of the Arrow Slit.  I Conan-ified it.  The original was more similar to more historical arrow slits int hat it was inset int a thick wall.  Castle walls are closer to Conan foundation thickness than wall thickness.  But, in game, it never really functioned well.  It had troubles placing ceilings over it, and I meant to try out using the existing materials.  So the new one is basically the T3 wall with an arrow slit chopped out.
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
